import './SignupForm.css'; import React, { useReducer, useState } from "react"; const init = { uname: "", password: "", role: "Patient", fname: "", lname: "", mono: "", email: "", adharno: "", dob: "", gender: "", bloodgrp: "", ac_status: "", state: "", city: "", pincode: "", landmark: "" }; const reducer = (state, action) => { switch (action.type) { case 'update': return { ...state, [action.field]: action.val }; case 'clear': return init; } } let PatientSignUp = () => { const [user, setUser] = useReducer(reducer, init); let handleSubmit = (u) => { u.preventDefault(); try { console.log(JSON.stringify(user)); user.ac_status = 1 let res = fetch("http://localhost:8080/psignup", { method: "post", headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(user), }); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } return ( <>

Patient Sign Up

{ handleSubmit(u) }}>
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'uname', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'password', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'fname', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'lname', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'email', val: u.target.value }) }} />

{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'adharno', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'dob', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'gender', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'gender', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'bloodgrp', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'state', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'city', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'pincode', val: u.target.value }) }} />
{ setUser({ type: 'update', field: 'landmark', val: u.target.value }) }} />

); } export default PatientSignUp;
